pr_title: Improve search feature by using keywords instead of full match

timeline.message: Improve search feature by using keywords instead of full match

timeline.bodyText: I think this should be "AND" (and use "()" around the "OR" parts). The search feature should only return episodes that contain all keywords, not only one of them
